EmailTemplate.name: Admin Portal Survey 5-2017
EmailTemplate.subject: Salt Administrator Portal Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName}:
Thank you for registering to use to the Salt Administrator Portal.
As we continue to develop and add new features to the Admin Portal we’d love to get your input on how we’re doing so far. Please take this short survey (http://app.keysurvey.com/f/1134406/87f5/) to provide us feedback on the Admin Portal and what additional features you might want to see added.
Thank You,
Salt Admin Portal Team
